author: Ivy Mix
description: Tequila, rum, sherry and orange liqueur combine harmoniously in this complex spirit-led, after dinner/late night sipper.
name: Palo Negro
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
2.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
